00018 #include <votca/kmc/vssmgroup.h>
00019 #include <vector>
00020 #include <map>
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include <votca/tools/vec.h>
00023 #include <votca/tools/database.h>
00024 #include <votca/tools/statement.h>

00027 using namespace std;
00028 using namespace votca::kmc;
00029 
00030 struct link_t;
00031 
00032 class node_t : public VSSMGroup<link_t> {
00033   public:
00034         node_t(int id)
00035           : _id(id), _occ(0) {}
00036         double _occ;
00037         int _id;
00038 
00039         void onExecute() {
00040                 _occ+=WaitingTime();
00041                 VSSMGroup<link_t>::onExecute();
00042         }
00043 };
00044 
00045 node_t *current;
00046 vec r(0,0,0);
00047 
00048 struct link_t {
00049         link_t(node_t *dest, double rate, vec r)
00050         : _dest(dest), _rate(rate), _r(r) {}
00051         double Rate() {
00052                 return _rate;
00053         }
00054 
00055         void onExecute() {
00056                 r+=_r;
00057                 current = _dest;
00058         }
00059         double _rate;
00060         node_t *_dest;
00061         vec _r;
00062 };
00063 
00064 class KMCApplication
00065         : public Application
00066 {
00067 public:
00068             virtual string ProgramName() { return "kmc_run"; }
00069             virtual void HelpText(std::ostream &out) { };
00070             void Initialize();
00071             bool EvaluateOptions();
00072             void Run(void);
00073 protected:
00074             void LoadGraph(void);
00075                 void RunKMC(void);
00076                 void WriteOcc(void);
00077 
00078                 map<int , node_t *> _nodes_lookup;
00079                 vector<node_t *> _nodes;
00080                 map<int , node_t *> _injection_lookup;
00081                 vector<node_t *> _injection;
00082                 string _injection_name;
00083                 double _runtime;
00084                 double _dt;
00085 };
00086 
00087 void KMCApplication::Initialize()
00088 {
00089         AddProgramOptions("KMC Options")
00090                 ("graph,g", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "file which contains graph")
00091                 ("time,t", boost::program_options::value<double>(), "time to run")
00092             ("seed,s", boost::program_options::value<int>(), "seed for kmc")
00093                 ("dt", boost::program_options::value<double>()->default_value(1e-4), "output frequency during run")
00094           ("injection,i", boost::program_options::value<string>()->default_value("*"), "name pattern for conjugated segments as injection points");
00095 }
00096 
00097 bool KMCApplication::EvaluateOptions()
00098 {
00099         CheckRequired("graph");
00100         CheckRequired("seed");
00101         CheckRequired("time");
00102         _runtime = OptionsMap()["time"].as<double>();
00103         _dt = OptionsMap()["dt"].as<double>();
00104         _injection_name=OptionsMap()["injection"].as<string>();
00105         //cout <<_injection_name<<endl;
00106         //_injection_name=OptionsMap()["i"].as<string>();
00107         return true;
00108 }
00109 
00110 void KMCApplication::Run(void)
00111 {
00112     srand(OptionsMap()["seed"].as<int>());
00113     Random::init(rand(), rand(), rand(), rand());
00114     LoadGraph();
00115     RunKMC();
00116 }
00117 
00118 void KMCApplication::LoadGraph() {
00119 
00120     Database db;
00121     db.Open(OptionsMap()["graph"].as<string > ());
00122 
00123     Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT _id,name FROM conjsegs;");
00124 
00125     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00126         int id = stmt->Column<int>(0);
00127         string name = stmt->Column<string>(1);
00128         node_t *n =new node_t(id);
00129         _nodes.push_back(n);
00130         _nodes_lookup[id] = _nodes.back();
00131         if (wildcmp(_injection_name.c_str(), name.c_str())) {
00132             _injection.push_back(n);
00133             _injection_lookup[id] = _injection.back();
00134         }
00135     }
00136     //delete stmt;
00137     cout << "Nodes: " << _nodes.size() << endl;
00138     cout << "Injection Points: " << _injection.size() << endl;
00139 
00140     delete stmt;
00141 
00142 
00143     int links = 0;
00144     stmt = db.Prepare("SELECT conjseg1, conjseg2, rate12, rate21, r_x, r_y, r_z FROM pairs;");
00145     while (stmt->Step() != SQLITE_DONE) {
00146         node_t *n1 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(0)];
00147         node_t *n2 = _nodes_lookup[stmt->Column<int>(1)];
00148         double rate12 = stmt->Column<double>(2);
00149         double rate21 = stmt->Column<double>(3);
00150         vec r = vec(stmt->Column<double>(4), stmt->Column<double>(5), stmt->Column<double>(6));
00151         n1->AddEvent(new link_t(n2, rate12, r));
00152         n2->AddEvent(new link_t(n1, rate21, -r));
00153         links += 2;
00154     }
00155     delete stmt;
00156     cout << "Links: " << links << endl;
00157 }
00158 
00159 void KMCApplication::RunKMC(void)
00160 {
00161         double t = 0;
00162         current=_injection[Random::rand_uniform_int(_injection.size())];
00163         cout <<"starting simulation at node: "<<current->_id-1<<endl;
00164         double next_output = _dt;
00165     int i=0;
00166     while(t<_runtime) {
00167         t+=current->WaitingTime();
00168                 current->onExecute();
00169         if(t > next_output) {
00170                 next_output = t + _dt;
00171                 cout << t << ": " << r << endl;
00172         }
00173     }
00174     _runtime = t;
00175     WriteOcc();
00176     cout << std::scientific << "\nKMC run finished\nAverage velocity (m/s): " << r/t*1e-9 << endl;
00177 }
00178 
00179 void KMCApplication::WriteOcc()
00180 {
00181     Database db;
00182         db.Open(OptionsMap()["graph"].as<string>());
00183         db.Exec("BEGIN;");
00184         Statement *stmt = db.Prepare("UPDATE conjsegs SET occ = ? WHERE _id = ?;");
00185         for(int i=0; i<_nodes.size(); ++i) {
00186                 stmt->Reset();
00187                 stmt->Bind(1, _nodes[i]->_occ/_runtime);
00188                 stmt->Bind(2, _nodes[i]->_id);
00189                 stmt->Step();
00190         }
00191         db.Exec("END;");
00192         delete stmt;
00193 }
00194 
00195 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00196 {
00197         KMCApplication app;
00198         return app.Exec(argc, argv);
00199 }
